item.title: 尼日利亚联合资本公司进军西非法语区
item.description: 联合资本公司（United Capital Plc）向尼日利亚证券交易所发表声明称，该公司在科特迪瓦成立了一家投资管理公司，在西非法语区的八个国家开展业务。【原文：United Capital Plc launched an investment management business from Côte d’Ivoire to operate in eight countries across French-speaking West Africa, according to a statement to the Nigerian stock exchange.】

item.title: 印度在致命空难后开始检查本国 787 喷气机
item.description: 印度航空公司一架 787 Dreamliner 飞机周四坠毁，机上 242 人除一人外全部遇难，印度表示已对该国 34 架波音公司 787 飞机中的 8 架进行了检查。【原文：India said that 8 of the 34 Boeing Co. 787 planes in the country have been inspected following the fatal crash of an Air India 787 Dreamliner on Thursday that killed all but one of the 242 people on board.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：以色列空袭提振油价
item.description: 以色列空袭伊朗参与核浓缩的原子设施后，原油价格飙升，投资者纷纷寻求黄金的安全保障。【原文：Crude oil prices surged and investors sought the safety of gold after Israel conducted airstrikes on Iranian atomic facilities involved in nuclear enrichment.】

item.title: 随着诺沃银行的出售，地中海银行业的交易浪潮进一步扩大
item.description: 席卷南欧的银行收购浪潮已波及葡萄牙。【原文：The wave of bank acquisitions washing over Southern Europe has reached Portugal.】

item.title: 令白宫分裂的海湾人工智能大交易
item.description:
人工智能的主导地位究竟意味着什么？【原文：

What does AI dominance actually mean?

】

item.title: 分裂白宫的海湾人工智能大交易（播客）
item.description: 分裂白宫的海湾人工智能大交易（播客）【原文：The Big Gulf AI Deal Dividing The White House (Podcast)】

item.title: 塔克离职在即，汇丰加紧物色下任主席
item.description: 随着汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）下一任主席人选的争夺战进入白热化，这家欧洲最大的银行正在加快步伐，为这一职位征集候选人名单。【原文：With the clock ticking in the hunt for HSBC Holdings Plc’s next chairman, Europe’s largest bank is speeding its efforts to assemble a list of candidates for the role.】

item.title: 拉加德告诉新华社记者：欧洲央行有望实现2%的通胀目标
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲中央银行正在接近实现消费价格增长的目标，并对美国关税带来的不确定性发出警告。【原文：The European Central Bank is approaching its goal for consumer-price growth, President Christine Lagarde said, warning of uncertainty emanating from US tariffs.】

item.title: 瑞士可能将利率降至零，银行面临考验
item.description: 瑞士国家银行下一次下调借贷成本可能会让银行头疼不已，如果官方最终首次尝试零利率的话。【原文：The Swiss National Bank’s next cut in borrowing costs may be about to cause a headache for banks, if officials end up experimenting with their first-ever interest rate of zero.】

item.title: 全球广告预算紧缩，影响者营销大行其道
item.description: 阿什顿-霍尔（Ashton Hall）的晨起习惯是把头浸泡在冰镇萨拉托加泉水中。对于销售瓶装水的公司来说，这真是个好消息。【原文：Ashton Hall’s morning routine involves dunking his head in iced Saratoga Spring Water. For the company that sells the bottled water — Hall’s brand of choice for drinking, brushing his teeth and submerging himself — that’s fantastic news.】

item.title: The Edge 称，Qualitas Health 考虑在马来西亚上市，筹资 9.42 亿美元
item.description: 据《The Edge》援引知情人士的话报道，亚洲医疗保健服务提供商Qualitas Health Group正在考虑首次公开募股，募集资金将高达40亿林吉特（约合9.42亿美元）。【原文：Asian healthcare provider Qualitas Health Group is weighing an initial public offering that will raise as much as 4 billion ringgit ($942 million), according to a report in The Edge, citing sources with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Ramp 在新一轮融资中估值达到 160 亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，金融技术初创公司 Ramp 在获得 2 亿美元融资后，估值已达 160 亿美元。【原文：Financial technology startup Ramp is now valued at $16 billion following a $200 million funding around, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说相对论空间公司将在施密特交易后反向拆股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，3D 打印火箭制造商 Relativity Space 公司实施了反向股票分割，大大稀释了现有股东和员工的股份。【原文：Relativity Space Inc., a maker of 3D-printed rockets, enacted a reverse stock split that has significantly diluted existing shareholders and staff, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 七国集团峰会临近，日本寻求与美国达成贸易协议的可能性
item.description: 日本最高贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世说，他通过在华盛顿的详细讨论寻求与美国同行达成贸易协议的可能性，但对于两国领导人是否可能在未来几天的峰会上宣布协议，他没有提供任何线索。【原文：Japanese top trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa said he sought the possibility of a trade agreement with his US counterparts through detailed discussions in Washington, while giving no clue over whether the two nations’ leaders may announce a deal at an expected summit in the coming days.】

item.title: 水晶宫足球俱乐部支持者 Eagle 秘密申请在美国上市
item.description: 全球最活跃的足球俱乐部投资者之一 Eagle Football Holdings Ltd. 已秘密申请在美国首次公开发行股票。【原文：Eagle Football Holdings Ltd., one of the most active investors in football clubs globally, has filed confidentially for a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 行业领袖称厄瓜多尔有望推迟新采矿费的征收
item.description: 据厄瓜多尔矿业商会副主席罗德里戈-达尔凯亚（Rodrigo Darquea）称，厄瓜多尔已表示将推迟实施一项新的采矿费，该费用预计每年可带来 2.29 亿美元的收入。【原文：Ecuador has indicated that it will delay the implementation of a new mining fee estimated to generate $229 million annually, according to Rodrigo Darquea, vice president of the country’s mining chamber.】

item.title: 摩根大通准备下周出售价值 65 亿美元的 Skechers 债务
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）计划最快于下周启动65亿美元的债务发行，以支持私募股权公司3G Capital收购鞋类制造商斯凯奇（Skechers）。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. plans to kick off a $6.5 billion debt offering to support private equity firm 3G Capital’s purchase of footwear maker Skechers as soon as next week, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 比利时信用评级遭惠誉下调，预算担忧挥之不去
item.description: 惠誉评级公司（Fitch Ratings）下调了比利时的主权信用评级，这表明该国控制多年来大量债务积累的能力的不确定性增加。【原文：Belgium’s sovereign credit was cut by Fitch Ratings, signaling an increase in uncertainty about the country’s ability to rein in years of substantial debt accumulation.】

item.title: 23andMe 联合创始人在基因数据拍卖中胜出
item.description: 破产基因分析公司 23andMe 的联合创始人在公司资产拍卖中胜出，同意与加利福尼亚州的一家研究机构一起支付 3.05 亿美元购买一批客户 DNA 数据。【原文：The co-founder of bankrupt genetic analysis company 23andMe won an auction for the firm’s assets, agreeing, along with a California research institute, to pay $305 million for a cache of customer DNA data】

item.title: 华尔街的动力机器面临中东压力测试
item.description: 这种地缘政治热点曾一度引发市场全面崩溃：以色列战机袭击伊朗核场址，德黑兰誓言报复，然后又付诸行动。石油价格飙升。【原文：It’s the kind of geopolitical flashpoint that might once have triggered a full-blown market meltdown: Israeli warplanes struck Iranian nuclear sites, Tehran vowed revenge — then followed through. Oil spiked.】

item.title: 对冲基金在以色列发动袭击前加大石油看涨押注
item.description: 在以色列对伊朗核计划发动打击之前的一周，对冲基金对美国原油采取了自一月份以来最看涨的立场，这使它们处于从本周油价跳涨中获利的位置。【原文：Hedge funds took the most bullish stance on US crude since January in the week before Israel launched strikes against Iran’s nuclear program, putting them in a position to profit from this week’s jump in oil prices.】

item.title: 欧洲离停止进口俄罗斯天然气又近了一步
item.description: 预计欧盟将在下周迈出重要一步，从明年起遏制俄罗斯天然气进口，目标是在 2027 年底前切断与前头号供应国的关系。【原文：The European Union is expected to take a major step next week toward curbing Russian gas imports starting next year with aims to sever ties with its former top supplier by the end of 2027.】

item.title: 谷歌收购安全公司 Wiz 的计划接受反垄断审查
item.description: 据知情人士透露，司法部反垄断执法人员正在审查谷歌计划以320亿美元收购网络安全公司Wiz Inc.是否会非法限制市场竞争。【原文：Justice Department antitrust enforcers are reviewing whether Google’s planned $32 billion acquisition of cybersecurity company Wiz Inc. would illegally limit competition in the marketplace, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 无人机制造商 Airo 在扩大 IPO 规模后股价最高上涨 291
item.description: 爱罗集团控股公司（Airo Group Holdings Inc.【原文：Airo Group Holdings Inc. shares climbed as much as 291% in their public trading debut on Friday after the company raised $60 million in an initial public offering, becoming the third company this month to more than double during its opening session.】

item.title: Dye & Durham 前首席财务官在股价下跌、债务增加后敦促出售公司
item.description: 加拿大技术公司 Dye & Durham Ltd.的一位前高管和股东要求董事会考虑全面出售公司，理由是股东价值骤降，竞争压力日益增大。【原文：A former senior executive and shareholder of Canadian technology firm Dye & Durham Ltd. is asking the board to consider a full sale of the company, citing a plunge in shareholder value and growing competitive pressures.】

item.title: 长期以来对战争风险麻木不仁的石油市场迎来忧虑周末
item.description: 过去两年中东紧张局势不断升级，让石油交易商对石油供应中断的风险持乐观态度。【原文：The past two years of escalating tensions in the Middle East have taught oil traders to be sanguine about the risk of disruption to oil supplies.】

item.title: 美联储将于 6 月 27 日公布银行压力测试结果
item.description: 美联储周五宣布，其年度银行压力测试结果将于 6 月 27 日公布。【原文：The Federal Reserve announced Friday that results from its annual bank stress tests will be released on June 27.】

item.title: 以太坊财政公司 SharpLink 因例行申报暴跌 69
item.description: SharpLink Gaming Inc.的股票周五暴跌了69%，因为该公司为一群投资者进行了股票登记，公司董事长辩解说这是标准程序。【原文：Shares of SharpLink Gaming Inc. plunged 69% on Friday following the registration of shares for a group of investors, a move the company’s chairman defended as standard procedure.】

item.title: 规模人工智能支持者 Accel 将在 Meta 交易中获得 25 亿美元的意外之财
item.description:
Accel是少数几家准备从规模人工智能早期押注中获得丰厚回报的风险投资公司之一。【原文：

Accel is among a handful of VC firms poised to see big returns from early bets on Scale AI. 

】

item.title: Vanguard 为其首创的基金设计寻求美国证券交易委员会的祝福
item.description:
该公司加入了众多向监管机构申请豁免救济的发行商行列

。【原文：

The firm joins a long list of issuers who have petitioned the regulator for exemptive relief

】
